properties.areaDesc: La Junta Vicinity/Otero County; Crowley County
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 7 at 10:31AM MST until February 7 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4
inches.

* WHERE...Crowley and Otero County including La Junta.

* WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slick and snowpacked roads at times with poor
visibility in heavy snow. The hazardous conditions could impact
the evening commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON
